title: How do I sort notifications by date
content: When I get a notification beep, I always have to scroll down and see if I can figure out which was the most recent (searching past 1d, 9h, 3d to finally get to 'now' or, more often, 2m by the time I find it). How do I get the notifications sorted so that the newest - the one for which I have just picked up my phone - is on top?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
